keywords.name: Burning
keywords.description: Burning creatures take damage at the end of their turn. Each turn, Burning is decreased by the amount Blocked. Also lowers the Transient's damage.

keywords.name: Concentrated
keywords.description: Doubles Crit chance for one turn.

keywords.name: Corrosion
keywords.description: At the end of turn, removes all Block and decreases Corrosion by 1.

keywords.name: Crit
keywords.description: Chance of single hit dealing TRIPLE Damage.

keywords.name: Expose
keywords.description: If target isn't Vulnerable, apply 1 Vulnerable.

keywords.name: Grenade
keywords.description: Grenades are cards, which attack ALL enemies and have Grenade in their name.

keywords.name: Painkillers
keywords.description: Painkillers are 0 cost Skills which heal a portion of your HP you lost in your turn and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Precision
keywords.description: Increases Crit chance of all attacks with Crit. Removed at the end of turn.

keywords.name: Silent damage
keywords.description:
This damage is NOT considered as Attack damage. That means it is not affected by Strength, Weakness or Vulnerable.
It also doesn't trigger Thorns, Curl Up, etc.
